title: 3-bedroom, 2-bath Single Family
description: Welcome to one of the most unique homes in Narberth on one of the loveliest streets in Narberth!  This 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath Cape Cod-style home offers first-floor living with a sunny living room, elegant dining room, new eat-in kitchen with adjacent three-season room and master bedroom and bath all on the first floor. Enjoy the new eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances.  Sleep well in your master bedroom with walk-in closet and full bathroom with windows facing the spacious backyard.   Park in the attached one-car garage, and enter the house protected from the elements.  Ascend the stairs to the second floor which has two large bedrooms with generously-sized closets, and a full bath.  This house also boasts a huge finished basement with a powder room, laundry area, and plenty of storage closets and cabinets.  Finished hardwood floors throughout the house, central ac, and a long driveway to park extra vehicles make the house even more special! Located in Lower Merion School District, this house is a 10-minute walk to quaint shops, the train, several parks, the library, and even a movie theater.  Tenant pays all utilities.  No pets, please. Furniture not included.$4,600 per month.

title: $975/1br-1Bedroom Apartment
description:
I am a resident renting with New Horizons Housing looking to terminate your lease early. I’m looking for a prospective tenant who can take over my lease of one Bedroom Apartment in University City. I recently moved into this apartment (July 9th), and I will have to leave by end of August. The term will be 12 months from the new start (September 1). The apartment is one bedroom with one bathroom. Living room is spacious and gets lots of natural light and with beautiful view. More details are attached. The apartment is recently painted and renovated and has air-conditioner. It is easy access to trolly and bus. The internet is ready to go.
Our renter requirements are:
-$50 non-refundable application fee
- minimum 625 credit score with no prior evictions
(If you do not have a reported score (N/A), proof of attendance to a local university can be used to circumvent the required credit score)
-First month, last month, and one month security deposit to move in. (First month prorated to # of days left in the month)
-Proof of income (net approx. 3x rent/month)
-Co-signers/guarantors allowed on an approval basis
(If you do not have the required score, after reviewing the contents of your screening report and proof of income, we may be able to provide other options.)
Move-in Costs:
-Security deposit equal to one month's rent ($970)
-First month's rent ($970 or (# of days left in the month pro-rated to 30 days))
-Last month's rent ($970)
-Insurance charges for first month ($12.50) due upon lease signing.
Rent and insurance charges will recur monthly thereafter.
Will need to agree to a 12 month lease. An agreement outside of a 12 month lease will need the approval of the property managers.
Unemployment does not count as proof of income as this income is permanent.
-No dogs, but cats are welcome.
-Proof of income (unemployment can not be used as proof of income).
you can reach out to New Horizons Housing company with any questions and concerns. http://newhorizonshousing.com/

Welcome home to Sea Aire & Mystic Point Apartments & Townhomes. Our tranquil, meticulously landscaped community offers residents 1 and 2-bedroom apartment homes with modern style and quality finishes. Spacious 2 & 3 Bedroom Townhomes are also available. Renovated apartments feature designer kitchens with cider cabinetry, premium light fixtures, brushed nickel hardware, and individual washers/dryers in select units. Sea Aire is nestled in a quiet residential setting where you’ll love soaking up the sun on your private balcony or patio or taking your dog for a walk through our lovely pet friendly community. Sea Aire & Mystic Point is positioned perfectly for residents to enjoy a brief commute to work at Shore Medical Center, AtlantiCare, Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa, FAA Technical Center, and Stockton University. Our community is just minutes from the Garden State Parkway and Atlantic City Expressway and is also convenient to Route 9 and Route 40. Within 5 miles you’ll enjoy South Jersey’s beaches, schools, and outdoor recreation. Down the street you’ll find Somers Point Plaza, including ACME Markets, Verizon, Petsmart and Snap Fitness. title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $620.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

title: Beautiful One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 2210 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 22nd floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

* Studio apartment home on 22nd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
